title: Integrations
content: # Integrations Mixeway is a software which is hub for security tools. It aims on integrating with tools security team use, and DevOps team use so the whole process of software development could be secured. Long story short it is all about integrations. ### IaaS Integrations Using IaaS integration Mixeway can download information about particular project with data like: IP addresses, hostnames, security group rules and more. Those data are being use to enable continuously scan whole infrastructure without even touching vulnerability scanner. **_Avaliable integrations:_** **_Planned for the future release:_** ### Network Scanning integrations Using network scanning integrations Mixeway can automatically run scans basing on provided information (gathered by API, IaaS plugin or entered manually). **_Avaliable integrations:_** ### WebApplication Scanning Integrations Using WebApplication Mixeway can automatically run scans basing on provided information (gathered by API or from network scan - from detected server wwww). **_Avaliable integrations:_** ### Source Code Security Audit: Using Source Code Security Audit Mixeway can automatically run manage SAST scans by the API and jenins plugin. **_Avaliable integrations:_** **_Planned for the future release:_** ### OpenSource Audits: Using OpenSource plugins Mixeway can download results from OpenSource scans which is crucial source of information for security quality gateway. **_Avaliable integrations:_** ### CIS Compliance Mixeway can also download results of CIS Compliance benchmark. **_Avaliable integrations:_** - Kubernetes benchmark - Docker benchmark ### Other integrations Mixeway integrates with BugTracking systems in order to automatically provide information about found vulnerabilities and CICD to properly introduce security quality gateway **_Avaliable integrations:_**
